VALIDATION_ERROR.PATTERN_FOR_PASSWORD: Make sure the password is at least eight characters long and must be in uppercase and must include elements of numbers, letters, and symbols such as ! and &

ROBOT.TEXT:
Hello!

I will help you quickly get comfortable and start working on our system!

To continue to communicate with a company that is interested in you, please go to your Personal Account and fill in the information.

After filling in your personal information, you will have access to the sections Add resume, Search for a company and Tests.

SPECIALISTS.DATA_PLAN_EXPIERED: Dear user Your data plan has expired. To continue to take advantage of the system, please go to the balance page and select the tariff.

STEP_1.TITLE: Attention!
STEP_1.INFO:
You are about to start a chat with this candidate. After confirming
 the action, information about other candidates in the list will be temporarily hidden.
 If this candidate does not suit you, you can cancel the action and access the list again
.

STEP_2.TITLE: Attention!
STEP_2.SUBTITLE: You started a chat with
STEP_2.INFO:
At this stage, the rest of the results of other candidates
 will be temporarily unavailable. The list will be available again if you decide that this candidate 
 does not suit you and close the chat with him.

STEP_3.TITLE: Attention!
STEP_3.SUBTITLE: You started a chat with
STEP_3.INFO:
In the lower left corner you have the option to accept an employee with
 the green button and cancel the action with the red button
STEP_3.TEXT_2:
This button is for accepting a candidate for a job, after
 this action the vacancy will be closed.
STEP_3.TEXT_4:
Clicking this button will close the chat with the candidate and you
 will again be able to access the list of other candidates.

STEP_4.TITLE: Attention!
STEP_4.INFO:
This action means that you are hiring this candidate,
 as soon as you confirm your action, the vacancy will end and
 be closed.

indicate benefits as per company policy, such as health care and insurance plan,
